congratulationsText: Well done! You solved the puzzle!
instructionsText: There are two sets of puzzle pieces below. Read the description of the picture and drag the correct pieces to the table below with your mouse.
descriptionText: Foreign language description of picture with nouns, verbs and lots of adjectives. Something like 'Un jeune homme, portant un t-shirt rouge, passe à vélo devant un cheval dans un champ par une journée ensoleillée.'
COMMENTalternativeDescriptionEnglish: A beautiful parrot in a lush forest eating a Brazil nut while looking at a jaguar on the ground
